description:
News Republic: THE definitive news app - offering the most comprehensive daily breaking news coverage from over 1,000 licensed & trusted news sources, personalized just for you. Now featuring a configurable news widget in Today section for iOS8 users.

- Visual: Get all the latest news from your favorite topics in a clean, visual format.

- Smart: News Republic learns as you read and personalizes your news experience automatically.

- Complete: We bring you complete articles with full text, photos and videos from trusted sources. No more clicking-away to read articles.

- Yours: Choose from over 1 million topics for a custom home screen and news experience.

- In-depth: Explore related topics via Tag Nav™, our innovative news navigation system.

- Power-user features: Add custom RSS feed sources from your favorite websites

Featuring hundreds of fully-licensed partners including The Associated Press, Reuters, Huffington Post, Business Insider, Bloomberg and TechCrunch.

Get complete news coverage on: National News, World News, Technology, Politics, Sports, Entertainment and over 1 million topics that you can personalize.

News Republic offers breaking news and daily updates in 9 regional editions - USA, UK, Germany, Italy, France, Spain, China, LatAm and International.

“News Republic offers the cure for infobesity” CNET.
“If you love news, News Republic is the right app for you!” AppDictions. 
“Best News App”! AppStorm.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
Be informed. Be prepared. Be engaged.
News Republic

releaseNotes:
We're happy to announce a Russian version of News Republic is coming soon! Although Russian is now available as a language option, we are officially launching with trusted Russian news partners in late November. Thanks for your patience.

Additional bug fixes include Facebook login and notification issues.

We love hearing from you, send feedback to contact.us@news-republic.com
Like the app? Please support us by leaving a review!
